mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.nick_name receiver_name, t3.nick_name sender_name from tb_message t1 inner join tb_user t2 on t1.receiver = t2.user_id inner join tb_user t3 on t1.sender = t3.user_id where t1.id = #{id}

select t1.*, t2.nick_name receiver_name, t3.nick_name sender_name from tb_message t1 inner join tb_user t2 on t1.receiver = t2.user_id inner join tb_user t3 on t1.sender = t3.user_id where t1.receiver = #{userId} or t1.sender = #{userId} order by t1.message_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_message (sender, receiver, message_time, title, message, read_flag, reply_id, reply_flag) values (#{sender}, #{receiver}, #{messageTime}, #{title}, #{message}, #{readFlag}, #{replyId}, #{replyFlag})
mapper.update: update tb_message set sender = #{sender}, receiver = #{receiver}, message_time = #{messageTime}, message = #{message}, title = #{title}, read_flag = #{readFlag}, reply_id = #{replyId}, reply_flag = #{replyFlag} where id = #{id}
